attr.name: align
attr.description: Sets the alignment of the rule on the page. If no value is specified, the default value is left.

attr.name: color
attr.description: Sets the color of the rule through color name or hexadecimal value.

attr.name: noshade
attr.description: Sets the rule to have no shading.

attr.name: size
attr.description: Sets the height, in pixels, of the rule.

attr.name: width
attr.description: Sets the length of the rule on the page through a pixel or percentage value.

content.description: None, it is an empty element.

omission.description: It must have start tag, but must not have an end tag.

parents.description: Any element that accepts flow content.
